name: Simple Character Prompt
description:
It generates the following:

Role, Symbol 1, Symbol 2, Strength, and Weakness. That’s it.

I made it for myself to practice character designs. The symbol results I personally use as requirements to incorporate into a design while the strength and weaknesses are mostly used for pose and a little background information on a character.

Feel free to use and try~ 

I’m mostly only uploading this here so I can use it on my tablet haha!
